alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Kandiyohi; Renville; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CHIPPEWA... SOUTHEASTERN SWIFT...NORTHWESTERN KANDIYOHI AND NORTHWESTERN RENVILLE COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clara City, or 18 miles southwest of Willmar, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A wind gust to 52mph was measured near Hanley Falls in Yellow Medicine County. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Willmar, Clara City, New London, Spicer, Raymond, Kerkhoven, Prinsburg, Green Lake, Pennock, Norway Lake, Willmar Airport, and Sibley State Park. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 60 and 78. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 119 and 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
